original_text: David also took the men who were with him, each with his family, and they settled in Hebron and its towns.
korean_text: 또 자기와 함께 한 추종자들과 그들의 가족들을 다윗이 다 데리고 올라가서 헤브론 각 성읍에 살게 하니라

sentences.original_text: David also took the men who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 또한 그와 함께 있던 사람들을 데려갔습니다
